ThingDef.label: persona Ancient Cleaver
ThingDef.description:
A mighty warcasket blade, constructed utilizing scavanged mechanoid and archotech parts.

Every other strike immolates the target.

m.p.V.S

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona Broken Blade
ThingDef.description:
Legendary warcasket blade, capable of cleaving even the heaviest armored foes in two. Each strike either emmits a powerful EMP discharge, or sets the target ablaze.

Legends speak of ancient heroes who fought horrifying Exostriders with blades like these.

Restoring such a formidable weapon is both time and resource consuming.

m.p.V.S

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona Intruder
ThingDef.description:
"You are indeed worthy!" is what users of this sickle reportedly hear the moment they obtain the weapon. It is likely that a malicious AI inhabits these twisted blades.

Strikes with this weapon cause severe burns and toxic buildup. Unnecessarily cruel tool.

ThingDef.label: persona Confessor
ThingDef.description:
"Guidance for the masses."

Confessor is an unholy union of a flamer and a gatling gun, that comes in the shape of an oversized assault rifle.

Standard loadout includes AP, seeker, and biohazard rounds. Quite possibly the best crowd control tool a warcasket can bring to a battlefield.

m.p.V.S

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona A-10 Brigador
ThingDef.description:
"Jack of all trades, master of all."

Brigador is a gargantuan, multi-purpose warcasket "sidearm". Similar to its smaller predecessor, that is used by Urbworld law enforcment, Brigador comes with several firemodes: AP burst, seeker, biohazard, hi-ex, EMP, and incendiary.

ThingDef.label: persona Ripper
ThingDef.description:
Ripper is a simple, easy-to-manufacture warcasket sidearm. Four rotating barrels allow Ripper to spew incredible amounts of hot lead, at the cost of accuracy. Standard ammunition sets targets on fire, and so does the bayonet-like underbarrel blade.

ThingDef.label: persona Cobra Assault Cannon
ThingDef.description:
An actual cannon that should be mounted on a vehicle, unfortunately (for its victims) it is used as a sniper rifle by warcaskets.

Origianlly designed by ancients, utilizing mechanoid tech, CAS is a force to be reckoned with. Standard loadout includes three types of gyrojet rockets: explosive, seeker, and biohazard.
